The EuroLeague is a professional basketball league that is considered the top-tier professional club basketball league in Europe. It is organized by the Euroleague Basketball Company, which is a joint venture between the Union of European Basketball Associations (UEFA) and the National Basketball Association (NBA). The EuroLeague is considered one of the most prestigious professional basketball leagues in the world, and it features some of the best teams and players from across Europe.
